pages.text: ‘Arau pararartisakalara majata mora sunama-sukhyati abyahata raakha
‘arau moka sukhamaya jannatara adhikaraisakalara antarbhukta karaa
‘arau mora pitrka ksama karaa, niscaya te'om pathabhrastabilakara antarbhukta achila
‘Arau (he mora raba!) Punaraut'thanara dina moka lanchita nakaraiba
‘Yidina dhana-sampada- arau santana-santati kono kamata nahiba
‘se'idina upakrta ha’ba kerala se'i byakti, yijane lai ahiba allahara ocarata bisud'dha antahkarana’
Arau (se'idina) muttakbisakalara babe nikatararti karaa ha’ba jannata
arau pathabhrastasakalara babe unmocita karaa ha’ba jahannama
sihamtaka koraa ha’ba, ‘tomalokara se'ibora upasya ka’ta, yiborara tomaloke upasana karaichila
allahara paraibarte? Sihamte tomalokaka sahaya karaiba paraene athaba sihamte atmaraksa karaibalai saksama ne
tara pichata se'i upasyaboraka arau pathabhrastabilakaka talamura karai jahannamata niksepa karaa ha’ba
lagate ibalichara sain'yabahinibilakako
Sihamte tata bitarkata lipta hai ka’ba
‘allahara sapata! Niscaya ami spasta pathabhrastatata achilo
‘yetiya ami tomalokaka srstijagatara pratipalakara samakaksa buli ganya karaichilo
‘arau amaka kerala aparaadhibilake'i pathabhrasta karaichila
‘Eteke amara kono chuparaichakarai na'i’
‘Arau kono antaranga bandhu'o na'i
‘Haya, yadi ami akau ebara ubhati yoraara suyoga palohemtena, tente ami muminasakalara antarbhukta hai ga’lohemtena!’
Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i mumina nahaya
Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu
Nuha sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
Yetiya sihamtara bhatr nuhe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraiba ne’
‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anusarana karaa
‘Arau ma'i tomalokara ocarata iyara babe kono pratidana nibicarao; mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami tomara prati imana anima neki athaca tomaka kerala nimnasraenira manuhe'i anusarana karaiche’
